domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @joncoopertweets Don’t blame ignorance or naïveté.  The overwhelming casualties of COVID-19 has been on the news for months.  The bottomline is that this guy couldn’t care less about other people lives until his and his families were impacted.  This is called “selfish”.  I offer no sympathy.
